popularityCurve.label: so what are my impressions first of all color accuracy has been greatly improved when i used the d200 to capture a water spring in the wood the whole image took on a green tint due to the sunlight reflecting off green leaves with nikon d3 the colors are much more neutral this is also true for the nikon d300 which also has the new scene recognition system apparently this is more than just a bit of marketing fluff and actually works

clusterList.phrase: so what are my impressions first of all color accuracy has been greatly improved when i used the d200 to capture a water spring in the wood the whole image took on a green tint due to the sunlight reflecting off green leaves with nikon d3 the colors are much more neutral this is also true for the nikon d300 which also has the new scene recognition system apparently this is more than just a bit of marketing fluff and actually works
earning this 4-star rating is a testament to the uncompromising performance and feature-rich design of the oc cs4100 scanner series

our goal is to provide highly reliable scanning solutions that offer maximum scanning flexibility productivity and color capture accuracy bertl's acknowledgement of these traits in the oc cs4100 series reinforces we've achieved this goal
after thorough evaluation the oc cs4100 scanner series emerged as one of the handful of devices deserving of our 4-star rating
